Object.Field:
OdiOutFile "-FILE=<?=confFileNameLocal?>" "-CHARSET_ENCODING=UTF-8" <<$$>?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?<$$>> <configuration> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.jobName</name> <value>OLH job for ODI Session <?=odiRef.getStep("SESS_GUID")?> Step <?=odiRef.getStep("NNO")?></value> <description> A Hadoop job name for this Oracle loader job. Used as input for the Job.setJobName() method. </description> </property>
<!-- =================== --> <!-- InputFormat Section --> <!-- =================== --> {# IF ( $[option_OVERRIDE_INPUTFORMAT.length()] > '0' ) #} <property> <name>mapreduce.inputformat.class</name> <value>$[option_OVERRIDE_INPUTFORMAT]</value> <description> Name of the class implementing InputFormat </description> </property> <property> <name>mapred.input.dir</name> <value>$[mapredInputDir]</value> </property> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.input.fieldNames</name> <value>$[fieldNames]</value> <description> optional list of column names </description> </property>
{# ELSIF ( $[isFromHive] == 'true' ) #} <property> <name>mapreduce.inputformat.class</name> <value>oracle.hadoop.loader.lib.input.HiveToAvroInputFormat</value> <description> Name of the class implementing InputFormat </description> </property> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.input.hive.databaseName</name> <value>$[hiveDatabase]</value> <description> Hive database name </description> </property> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.input.hive.tableName</name> <value>$[unqualifiedHiveTableName]</value> <description> Name of the Hive source table </description> </property> <property> <name>hive.metastore.uris</name> <value>$[hiveMetastoreUris]</value> <description> List of all URIs for the Hive metastore </description> </property> <property> <name>hive.metastore.local</name> <value>false</value> <description> Using an embedded metastore? </description> </property>
{# ELSIF ( $[isFromFile] == 'true' ) #} <property> <name>mapred.input.dir</name> <value>$[mapredInputDir]</value> </property> <property> <name>mapreduce.inputformat.class</name> <value>$[inputFormatClass]</value> <description> Name of the class implementing InputFormat </description> </property> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.input.fieldNames</name> <value>$[fieldNames]</value> <description> optional list of column names </description> </property>
{# IF ( $[isDelimitedSourceFile] == 'true' ) #}<? /* Properties for delimited files: */ ?> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.input.fieldTerminator</name> <value>$[fieldTerminator]</value> <description> column separator </description> </property> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.input.initialFieldEncloser</name> <value>$[initialFieldEncloser]</value> <description> start string delimiter </description> </property> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.input.trailingFieldEncloser</name> <value>$[trailingFieldEncloser]</value> <description> end string delimiter </description> </property>
{# ELSE #}<? /* Properties for fixed len files: */ ?> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.input.regexPattern</name> <value>$[regexPattern]</value> <description> column separator </description> </property> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.input.regexCaseInsensitive</name> <value>false</value> <description> Directs the pattern matching to be case insensitive. Same as org.apache.hadoop.hive.contrib.serde2.RegexSerDe's "input.regex.case.insensitive" property. </description> </property> {# ENDIF #}
{# ENDIF #}
<property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.rejectLimit</name> <value>$[rejectLimit]</value> </property>
<!-- =================== --> <!-- OutputFormat Section --> <!-- =================== --> {# IF ( $[isOutputModeJDBC] == 'true' ) #} <property> <name>mapreduce.job.outputformat.class</name> <value>oracle.hadoop.loader.lib.output.JDBCOutputFormat</value> <description> Output mode after the loader job executes on Hadoop </description> </property>
{# ELSIF ( $[isOutputModeOCI] == 'true' ) #} <property> <name>mapreduce.job.outputformat.class</name> <value>oracle.hadoop.loader.lib.output.OCIOutputFormat</value> <description> Output mode after the loader job executes on Hadoop </description> </property>
{# ELSIF ( $[isOutputModeDP] == 'true' ) #} <property> <name>mapreduce.job.outputformat.class</name> <value>oracle.hadoop.loader.lib.output.DataPumpOutputFormat</value> <description> Output mode after the loader job executes on Hadoop </description> </property> {# ENDIF #} <property> <name>mapreduce.output.fileoutputformat.outputdir</name> <value><?=mapredOutputDir?></value> </property>
<!-- ===================== --> <!-- Oracle target Section --> <!-- ===================== --> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.loaderMap.targetTable</name> <value>$[oracleTableName]</value> </property> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.loaderMap.columnNames</name> <value>$[oracleColumnNames]</value> </property> {# FOR ($[olhColumnNameList],$[olhFieldNameList],$[olhFieldFormatList]) IN ($[COL_NAME],$[FIELD_NAME],$[FIELD_FORMAT]) SEP = '0x000A' #} <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.loaderMap.$[COL_NAME].field</name> <value>$[FIELD_NAME]</value> </property> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.loaderMap.$[COL_NAME].format</name> <value>$[FIELD_FORMAT]</value> </property> {# ENDFOR #}
<!-- ========================= --> <!-- Oracle Connection Section --> <!-- ========================= --> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.connection.user</name> <value>$[destUserName]</value> <description> Name of the user connecting to the database</description> </property> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.connection.password</name> <value>$[destPassword]</value> <description> Password of the user connecting to the database</description> </property> <property> <name>oracle.hadoop.loader.connection.url</name> <value>$[destJavaUrl]</value> <description> Database connection string </description> </property>
{# IF ( $[option_EXTRA_OLH_CONF_PROPERTIES.length()] > '0' ) #} <!-- =================== --> <!-- Custom Properties --> <!-- =================== --> $[option_EXTRA_OLH_CONF_PROPERTIES] {# ENDIF #}
</configuration>

LKM File to Oracle OLH-OSCH Direct
